welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mount Vista, the charming city known for its stunning mountain views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines, United Airlines, and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Portland Airport mainly serves regional airlines and offers a more compact and efficient layout.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Portland Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and amenities for these travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
